marketplaces.name: output-style-to-plugin-skill
marketplaces.description: Skill for converting deprecated Claude Code output styles to plugin format
marketplaces.repo_description: A Claude Code skill that automates the conversion of deprecated output styles to the new plugin format

files.README.md:
# Output Style to Plugin Converter

A Claude Code skill that automates the conversion of deprecated output style markdown files into the new plugin format with SessionStart hooks.

## Overview

This skill helps you migrate from the deprecated `outputStyle` configuration to the modern plugin system. It handles the complete conversion process automatically, including:

- Creating proper plugin directory structure
- Generating all required configuration files
- Setting up SessionStart hooks
- Creating marketplace configuration
- Providing installation instructions

## Installation

### Add the Marketplace

```bash
/plugin marketplace add https://github.com/pc035860/skill-output-style-to-plugin
```

### Install the Skill

```bash
/plugin install output-style-to-plugin@output-style-to-plugin-skill
```

## Usage

Simply mention the skill when you need to convert an output style:

```
Convert my output style to plugin format
```

The skill will guide you through:
1. Gathering required information (plugin name, description, author, etc.)
2. Checking for existing marketplace or creating a new one
3. Creating the complete plugin structure
4. Generating all configuration files
5. Providing installation and testing instructions

## What It Does

The skill automates the entire conversion workflow:

- **Step 1**: Collects essential information from you
- **Step 2**: Checks for existing marketplace or creates new one
- **Step 3**: Creates proper plugin directory structure
- **Step 4**: Generates configuration files (plugin.json, hooks.json, etc.)
- **Step 5**: Copies your output style content
- **Step 6**: Provides installation instructions
- **Step 7**: Validates the created structure

## Structure

```
skill-output-style-to-plugin/
├── .claude-plugin/
│   └── marketplace.json          # Marketplace configuration
├── output-style-to-plugin/        # The skill itself
│   ├── SKILL.md                   # Skill instructions
│   ├── assets/                    # Template files
│   │   ├── hooks.json.template
│   │   ├── marketplace.json.template
│   │   ├── plugin.json.template
│   │   ├── README.md.template
│   │   └── session-start.sh.template
│   └── references/                # Documentation
│       ├── plugin-structure.md
│       └── troubleshooting.md
├── README.md                      # This file
└── LICENSE                        # MIT License
```

## Requirements

- Claude Code with plugin support
- An existing output style markdown file to convert

## Resources

- [Claude Code Plugin Documentation](https://docs.claude.com/en/docs/claude-code/plugins)
- [Plugin Marketplaces](https://docs.claude.com/en/docs/claude-code/plugin-marketplaces)

## License

MIT License - See LICENSE file for details

## Author

pc035860

## Contributing

This is an open-source project. Feel free to submit issues or pull requests!

plugins.name: output-style-to-plugin
plugins.description: This skill should be used when converting deprecated Claude Code output styles (.md files) into the new plugin format. It automates the entire conversion process including creating plugin structure, generating configuration files, and setting up local marketplace for testing.
